author: Richard Long Jr
comment: The classic watch face works perfectly for me on my walks / runs. The watch face widgets can be configured to your liking.  Please read the manual first, it is well written. I was able to setup the watch face easily.  I am using this app with a Asus Zen Watch 1, without any issues.
title: Great App for long walks (Ramblers)

author: Ashofor Stanley
comment: App stopped working after update today. Watch face is sent to watch but that's how far it gets. Nothing can be accessed on phone, setting cannot be changed etc. Please fix.

reply.author: nwg
reply.content: Doesn't it still work for you? Nobody else reported such behavior, and there're new installs every day. If so, please give some more info.

title: App stopped working.

author: Luke Biddell
comment: Looks good on a gear live. Unfortunately, the companion phone app isn't in the menu on my Nexus 5.  UPDATE: Now I know how to get to the settings, it's working great. Very light on battery when not navigating too.

reply.author: nwg
reply.content: There's no launcher icon, as it's a service, not a standalone app. Just enter the watch face settings (click the gear icon on the watch face miniature in the Android Wear on-phone app).

title: Neat

author: Afonso Santos
comment: More navigational features than in all but the top of the line big brand name GPS sportswatches.
title: Watchface with the personality of a full blown navigational APP

author: Greg Mitchell
comment: Great face with loads of functions. My only challenge is calibrating the compass.

reply.author: nwg
reply.content: It's the device dependent. On my SW3 I usually manage to do it at 2nd - 3rd attempt. :) BTW: in most cases, except for slow walking, the location based mode seems to be more useful. The compass based mode makes sense while mushrooming, sightseeing etc.

title: Great watch face for the SW3

author: Soo Lim
comment: Find my way back to hotel

author: Patrick Crabtree
comment: Complains that screen overlay needs to be disabled.  I disabled ALL apps from being able to overlay the screen (system and user installed) and it still throws the same error.  Would love to install if this is resolved.  Note 4 with Android 6.01 stock

reply.author: nwg
reply.content: This issue is related to your device, not the application. Please read the manual,  troubleshooting section.

title: Won't allow me to set permissions...
